title: Potential Link
description:
Link definitions in schemas are not applied to all instances, and they are not the same for all instances.

This object represents the link definition in the schema, and is not attached to any particular instance data.

addHandler.description: Adds a link handler for any links created from this definition

arguments.title: handler
arguments.description:
handler(link, submittedData, request)

Return boolean false if handled, and no further handlers will be called.

addPreHandler.description: Adds a link pre-handler for any links created from this definition

arguments.title: preHandler
arguments.description:
preHandler(link, submissionData)

Return boolean false to cancel the link.

canApplyTo.description: Whether this link definition can produce a link for the specified data.

linkForData.description: Assembles an actual link for the specified data

usesKey.description: Whether the link definition uses the value from a specified key

arguments.title: key
arguments.description: null represents the whole data value
